dct_description_sm: "Card series." "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1866 by Charles Scribner & Co. in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York." Double hemispherical world map on a globular projection. Relief shown by hachures and form lines.
dct_publisher_sm: New York : Published by Ch. Scribner & Co., 1866.
